branchCategory.name: CKZ3T
branchCategory.description: <p>Power clamp cylinder series CKZ3T-X2734, was designed with metal switch cassette cover with reconfiguration for simple switch adjustment.&nbsp; Similar to the CKZ3T, the arm opening angle can be easily changed by replacing the stopper bolt.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZ3T Power Clamp Cylinder
branchItem.description: <p>Power clamp cylinder series CKZ3T-X2734, was designed with metal switch cassette cover with reconfiguration for simple switch adjustment.&nbsp; Similar to the CKZ3T, the arm opening angle can be easily changed by replacing the stopper bolt.</p>
